description: Ends at 9PM PT. 1SaleADay has the Euroflex Monster Steam-Jet-II 1200w Disinfecting Floor Steam Cleaner with 3 Microfiber Pads for $50 + $5 shipping = $55 shipped. Includes Clean Blast solution, ready in 3 minutes, and kills up to 99.9% of bacteria. Amazon ReviewsCompare  Report
eBay with Daily Steals has the Evolve Macaw Water-Saving Handheld Showerhead for $30 with free shipping. Normally found for around $60. Features 5 spray patterns and 59” metal hose. Compare  Report

Amazon has a 20-pack of Sparkle Giant Pick-A-Size Paper Towels for $20 with free shipping on $25+. 144 2-ply sheets per roll. Features thirst pockets for extra absorption. Good Amazon reviews. Compare  Report
Walmart has the Hoover Max Extract Dual V WidePath Carpet Washer  for $165 with free shipping.  Features SpinScrub cycles for deep cleaning and autoamtic detergent mixing system. Compare  Report

Amazon has the 48-Pack Quilted Northern Ultra Plush Double Rolls for $24 - 5% off with Subscribe & Save (can cancel at any time)  = $23 with free shipping. Thick, absorbent, and 100% biodegradable. Compare  Report

Amazon has the Progress Lighting Janos 3-light Chandelier (Brushed Nickel) for $52 with free shipping. Normally around $120. Features adjustable hanging length up to 72" and uses three 100W bulbs. Compare  Report

Ends 11/19. Newegg has the Dyconn WF002-A2ORB 7.5" Glass Waterfall Sink Faucet for $40 with free shipping. Features a single lever handle and includes all mounting and installation hardware. $66+ elsewhere. Compare  Report
Ends at 9PM PT. Price Plunge has the Lentek Intelli-Vac RV01G Robotic Vacuum for $37 + $5 shipping = $42 shipped. Can run for 20, 40, or 60 minutes. At least guaranteed to spook pets. Compare  Report

Today only. Sears has the Craftsman 5/8" x 50 ft. Heavy Duty Neverkink Self-Straightening Hose on sale for $15 with free in-store pickup or $10 home delivery. Discount appears in cart. Features reflex mesh construction, solid brass octagon coupling, and MicroShield to guard against mold and mildew. Compare  Report

Home Depot is offering 10% off items sitewide (original price) with coupon code JX84KHGT. This offer cannot be combined with any other discount, offer, promotion or special incentive program. Select items have free shipping to home or free in-store pickup.  Report

The Container Store is taking up to 50% off select items in their Special Savings section. Free in-store pickup is available; shipping to home starts at $9. The pictured Large Cheyenne Lined Bin is on sale for $11 with free in-store pickup.  Report

Amazon has the Panasonic MC-UL810 Bagless Upright Vacuum Cleaner for $109 - $15 off coupon (click "Clip this coupon") = $94 with free shipping. Normally $125 to $160. Uses a bagless cyclonic vacuum system and it lies completely flat for getting under couches and beds. Compare  Report

Similar mats are around $15+. Can also be used as welcome mat or in the kitchen. Compare  Report
